discussion.p: copy_options::copy_symlinks is not used (should test it before calling copy_symlinks in copy).
discussion.note: 20 May 2014 Beman Dawes provides proposed wording.

ul.li: If options & copy_options::skip_symlinks, then return. Missing != copy_options::none fixed by issue 59

Otherwise if !exists(t) && (options & copy_options::copy_symlinks) != copy_options::none
, then copy_symlink(from, to, options) .
Otherwise report an error as specified in Error reporting (7).
